meanings: 돈을 빼앗기 위해 swindle (sb out of sth)

vlive.korean: 속임수네요. It's all a fake. 듣기 View video UNIQ : 무대가 끝나고 난 뒤~
진짜 속임수. You are faking it. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Replay] Christmas Week EP.4 SEVENTEEN (세븐틴)
속임수 쓰려고. I used it as a trick. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : 우주소녀 이미지 증발 버라이어티 <우소보쇼> 8화
vlive.english: I used it as a trick.

vlive.korean: 도준씨 이런 속임수 쓰지 말고. Don't try to cheat on us. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Man's Avenue - 맨스에비뉴 '도전 1000곡! 랜덤 빙고게임!'
vlive.english: Don't try to cheat on us.

vlive.korean: 이렇게 속임수 써도 돼요? Is this kind of trick acceptable? 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Underdog - 언더독 '충격의 거지꼴! 언더독 히트다히트!'
vlive.english: Is this kind of trick acceptable?

examples.korean: his brazen admission that he was cheating 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자기가 속임수를 썼다는 그의 뻔뻔한 인정 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: his brazen admission that he was cheating Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was accused of lies and deceit. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 거짓말을 하고 속임수를 썼다는 비난을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was accused of lies and deceit. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She had been hoodwinked into buying a worthless necklace. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 속임수에 넘어가서 가치 없는 목걸이를 샀었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had been hoodwinked into buying a worthless necklace. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He cheats at cards. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 카드를 할 때 속임수를 쓴다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He cheats at cards. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What a dirty, low-down trick! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정말 더럽고 야비한 속임수로군! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What a dirty, low-down trick! Add to Wordbook
